name: New Communities Inc.
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: New Communities Inc. is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Norway, ME. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $46.6M in Medicaid payments across 30K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $46.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
